active_incidents.title: Trouble with loading messages after converting from group direct messages to private channels

notes.body: We've addressed the root cause so converting group direct messages to private channels can now be done without issue. We are working to fix isolated cases still affected and please contact us at feedback@slack.com if you're experiencing any trouble. We apologize for any disruption caused.
Some customers may be experiencing issues with loading messages after converting from group direct messages to private channels. Weâ€™re investigating and will be back with an update shortly.
